paper_title.en: Improvement of Transmittance and Viewing Angle of Optically Compensated Bend Mode Liquid Crystal Display Using Wide-Viewing-Angle Circular Polarizer

description.en: A field sequential color liquid crystal display (LCD) has been developed using an optically compensated bend (OCB) mode liquid crystal cell and a light-emitting diode backlight. Application of a wide-viewing-angle- and wide-band-type circular polarizer realized a wide-viewing-angle and high-transmittance OCB-mode LC cell. In this paper, we describe the principle of the optical compensation and the fundamental characteristics of an advanced OCB-mode LCD. (C) 2009 The Japan Society of Applied Physics

paper_title.en: Improvement of Transmittance and Viewing Angle of Optically Compensated Bend Mode Liquid Crystal Display Using Wide-Viewing-Angle Circular Polarizer

description.en: A field sequential color liquid crystal display (LCD) has been developed using an optically compensated bend (OCB) mode liquid crystal cell and a light-emitting diode backlight. Application of a wide-viewing-angle- and wide-band-type circular polarizer realized a wide-viewing-angle and high-transmittance OCB-mode LC cell. In this paper, we describe the principle of the optical compensation and the fundamental characteristics of an advanced OCB-mode LCD. (C) 2009 The Japan Society of Applied Physics

paper_title.ja: High Accurate Method for Measurement Drdinary and Extraordinary Refractive Indices of Liquid Crystal Materials, Cell Thickness, and Pretilt Angle of Liquid Crystal Cells Using Ellipsometry

paper_title.en: Study of adsorption strength of liquid crystal molecules on the polymer surface based on the analysis of the surface alignment of the adsorbed layer

description.en: The adsorption strength of liquid crystal molecules on the polymer surface was compared measuring temperature dependence of retardation of an absorbed layer. The relationship between surface order parameter and adsorption strength on the non rubbed polymer surface was discussed.

paper_title.ja: The Interference-Inclued 2×2 Matrix Method for High-Precision Measurements of Liquid Crystal Parameters
paper_title.en: The Interference-Included 2x2 Matrix Method for High-Precision Measurements of Liquid Crystal Parameters

description.en: We devised the interference-included 2x2 matrix method by which optical properties included multiple interferences in a cell can be calculated at high speed. The high-precision measurements of parameters were achieved by using the method, and we succeeded in the improvement of the optical characteristic simulation accuracy by ten times compared with the conventional accuracy.
